alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 3:32PM PDT until April 04 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM PDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLATSOP AND NORTH CENTRAL TILLAMOOK COUNTIES... At 330 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Elsie, or 13 miles east of Manzanita, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salmonberry and Sunset Summit. In Oregon this includes U.S. Highway 26 west of Portland between mile markers 23 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
